definitions.text: the arrangement of the body and its limbs
examples: he assumed an attitude of surrender

definitions.text: characteristic way of bearing one's body
capability in terms of personnel and materiel that affect the capacity to fight a war
examples: we faced an army of great strength
politicians have neglected our military posture

definitions.text: behave affectedly or unnaturally in order to impress others
examples: Don't pay any attention to him--he is always posing to impress his peers!
She postured and made a total fool of herself

definitions.text: assume a posture as for artistic purposes
examples: We don't know the woman who posed for Leonardo so often
